title: Sr. Hardware Development Engineer
summary: Apple is looking for a highly motivated senior hardware development engineer to join Display Technologies Organization to work on technology development of new display and optical module architectures for future Apple products.
description:
-  Define technical work scope, drive technical directions, and make systematic development plans to establish fundamental engineering learnings and meet product interception schedule.
-  Initiate new module technologies to enable challenging design architectures in display and optics.
-  Hands-on design, build, test, and refine hardware prototypes and systems in MTC’s labs to enable critical technology proof-of-concept and convergence.
-  Hands-on drive process development in MTC's labs, including resource and DOE planning, empirical validation trials, data analysis and visualization, parameter optimization, and realistic risk assessment.
-  Collaboratively work with cross-functional teams to plan and align the development strategy, and demonstrate technical results / issues to executives.
preferred_qualifications:
MS or Ph.D. in Mechanical Engineering, Optical Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Physics, Material Science, or relevant engineering field with minimum 5 years of experience is preferred.
Proficient in mechanical design (i.e. NX, Solidworks), GD&T, and precision manufacturing techniques.
Hands-on experience in Opto-mechanical system, Metrology, Optical science and leveraging optical simulation tools (i.e. Zemax).
Hands-on experience in designing and developing control systems and software interface (i.e. Labview, Python, etc), Mechatronics and robotics, Sensing technology and integrations.
Strong knowledge in data processing, statistical tools and data visualization using Matlab, Python, JMP, or similar tools.
